items.summary: Update the Destination Detail page UI to include a dedicated lodging section that explicitly covers “Hotels” and “Airbnb” options (in addition to any existing homestay/guesthouse content), with clear headings and concise guidance in English.

Add a new “Local Transport” section to the Destination Detail page that covers common options such as renting a bike and hiring a cab/taxi, using the existing component patterns (Cards, icons, and AffiliateCtaPlaceholder-style CTA placeholders where appropriate).
